ComicInfo.Summary: 'I'M MAD AS HELL, AND I'M NOT GOING TO TAKE THIS ANYMORE!' As an act of violence spirals out of control to encompass the entirety of the news media, a cult has emerged from the errors and retractions that have ruined careers, marriages and even lives. Under direction from his cult master, The Hand leads an army of followers committed to revolution, willing to die for their cause.
